data.title: Yuvika Chaudhary turns singer, set to release her debut song next month
data.meta_description: Now the actress and model is set to achieve another feat adding a feather to her hat, by releasing her first song. Read on to know more.
data.text:
Yuvika Chaudhary has garnered a lot of praise for herself in the industry as an actress and a model. She has carved a niche with her performances in music videos as well as TV reality shows.

Now the actress and model is set to achieve another feat adding a feather to her hat, by releasing her first song.

News is that she will release her debut song next month. Yuvika has been seen in quite a lot of music videos Tere Khyalan, Chalo Jeete HainSajjna Ve Sajjna, Tera Mera Naam Sohneya, Pyar Hoya Ae, Kudi Sweet and many many more.

She has wowed us in music videos with her husband Prince Narula as well. Yuvika has increased her fan following after featuring in Bollywood movies. Such as Om Shanti Om, Naughty @ 40, Toh Baat Pakki!, Lakeeran.

And now she is set to sing for her own song that she will feature in too. Fans of the young actress are excited to hear her sing and see her in a new song, in her own beautiful voice.
